info.name: Steam - fade owned items
info.description: It fades items that you already have (Steam does it by default, but it's not enough, at least for me).
info.additionalInfo:
22/06/2016 - Just saying that it's still working. Happy hunting on Steam Sale 2017!
25/11/2016 - Fix for CSS changes in Steam Store.
20/11/2016 - It's still working, no changes done, even with newest store update.
